name: SunStyle Retail Enterprise ERP Suite
description: Comprehensive, production-grade NetSuite customization suite for fashion retail operations spanning customer service, inventory management, financial operations, and supply chain automation. Includes 177 SuiteScript files and 2,016 custom objects supporting Customer Service Hub, Production Plus manufacturing, equity pickup processing, landed cost management, and multi-channel sales workflows. Designed specifically for sunglasses/eyewear retail with extensive automation across finance, supply chain, and customer operations domains.
